item.title: Code Snippet Serie - 01 - SQL Like injection
item.author: Elweth
item.description: Challenge Description This challenge, authored by @Elweth, involves exploiting a vulnerability in a SQL Query which lets you abuse the LIKE clause to first bypass authentication and then retrieve the entire API key. Vulnerability Overview ðŸ›‘ Vulnerability: The vulnerability lies in the SQL query, which remains vulnerable despite the use of the prepare statement system in Python. Conventional SQL injection exploitation methods won’t work here, because the query is correctly prepared with python.
